data.eml:eml: A monograph of the genus Westwoodia (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wharton, Robert A., Roeder, Karl, Yoder, Matthew J. (2008): A monograph of the genus Westwoodia (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae). Zootaxa 1855: 1-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183505
